TextLibrary.Text: Sable
I've been told we are almost ready to be trusted with their device.
I've been told we are almost ready to be trusted with their device.
Almost ready? What's next?
Almost ready? What's next?
Nasty Butler wants to make sure we can get where we need to go.
Nasty Butler wants to make sure we can get where we need to go.
We have a ship, shouldn't we have passed this step already?
Oh, I get it. He wants us to hack a leapgate.
They have uploaded a virus on the Atlia-Serpens Leapgate, and want us to prove we can hack it.
Yes, specifically the Atli-Serpens Leapgate.
So does this mean Nasty Butler and the MRI are behind the leapgate virus?
I guess that shouldn't be too hard.
Probably not. This virus is independent of whatever has caused all of the malfunctions. It was created just to test us.
I'm glad you think so. We will be rewarded for the hacking as usual.
He is shutting down traffic through a leapgate just so we can prove our capabilities?
I guess that means the general population doesn't know we're hacking this one as a test.
Yes, which is why we should get to hacking it A.S.A.P.
Apparently not, we should get to hacking it quickly before it slows down traffic too badly.
Okay, let's go then.
We will head straight there.
